title: Optimising Large Data Set Visualisations with the M4 Algorithm
description: A deep dive into how we implemented the M4 algorithm to create a line chart that can support over a million data points at 60fps.

title: What's New in AG Grid 33
description: What's New in AG Grid 33 - Bundle size improvements, Async Context Menu support, and Default Column Header customisation.

title: What's New in AG Charts 11
description: What's New in AG Charts 11 - Fibonacci Tools for Financial Charts, Grouped Category Axis, and Save/Restore Chart State.

title: Writing E2E Tests for AG Grid React Tables with Playwright
description: Learn how to write E2E tests for AG Grid with Playwright, including how to test rendering, user interaction, and accessibility.
